website_summaries.verdict: A 2-in-1 stain remover and repellent for a low price.
pros: The natural lemongrass and cinnamon smell are pleasant, while keeping cats away effectively
This is a low-cost solution to repeat offenders that will keep them from returning to the scene of the crime
cons: This product may be more effective as a stain remover than as a repellent

customer_reviews.title: It works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I rescued a community cat, unneutered male. He came in to the porch and sprayed 3 places including the beach chair. After I took him to have a surgery, I cleaned up and sprayed this all over. He came back a few days later from the shelter and vet, and didn't try to spray at all. I could smell the scent which is A LOT more pleasant than urine. I noticed some other cats spraying outside my front door and plants, and since I didn't know exactly where, I sprayed this all over, and haven't smelled urine outside since. I recommend! The ingredients seem to be efficient and safe for animals and people.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra G.

customer_reviews.title: "MIRACLE"
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what it says! MIRACLE! I have 2 boy cats, both are fixed, but determined to prove territory indoors. Smell is gone, stains are gone, and the remarking has diminished, not totally gone, but greatly diminished!
customer_reviews.author: Janet M.

customer_reviews.title: This product is the best for cat owners
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best for cat owners. Our cat loves to mark his territory even though he has been fixed. The product has a fresh scent with the slight scent of cinnamon. I sprayed it throughout the house when we were out of town to keep our kitty from smelling up the house while we were gone. When we returned it smelled just as nice as when we left. Good kitty!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Our elderly cat kept urinating near the litterbox. Fresh litter, different litter, nothing seemed to help. The veterinarian found nothing wrong with her physically. We tried a couple of the other "flavors" that are supposed to block odor, but she still kept going on the floor about once every two or three days. Finally, we tried the strategy that now works: the special area gets wiped down and dried off, then utterly saturated with this (fantastic-smelling) spray every single day. On top of that, we're keeping the litter fresh and clean, every day. It's working! And the room smells like Christmas! 🐺
customer_reviews.author: Puttie Cat

customer_reviews.title: my cat was attracted (in a bad way) to my polyurethane rugs
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. I ordered before I went to bed. It arrived on my doorstep at 7am! I recently adopted a rescue cat. She was having a hard time adjusting, and would spray the front door. Also, my cat was attracted (in a bad way) to my polyurethane rugs. This type of rug always has some sort of bad smell, and my cat thought it was appropriate to pee on it. I soaked my throw rugs with Nature's Miracle No More Spraying to neutralize the bad smells. It worked...My cat doesn't spray/pee anymore and she's more relaxed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda C

customer_reviews.title: I have always found NM products to be the very best if you have cats
customer_reviews.text: We have a Tomcat that keeps spraying around our house . I don’t know why, my girl cat is spayed sooo... anyway everyday I was cleaning front door and back door. Got really tired of this so I used this on the areas after I cleaned. I do think he’s doing it less. Perhaps he’s given up on my girl cat I don’t know, maybe a coincidence I don’t know. Whatever reason I don’t smell Tomcat every time I walk outside now. I have always found NM products to be the very best if you have cats.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L. Hanberg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brand/product- gets red of odor
customer_reviews.text: Works Great. Awesome product. Have used on hard surfaces and fabrics and its worked on both. Cleans well and gets rid of odor. Leaves room smelling fresh. Recommend brand to anyone who has pets. Works on urine and hairball/vomit spots. The only thing it didn't seem to do is act as a repellent however I was more interested in cleaning and getting rid of odor so for my purposes it worked great
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I feed the strays. At time as many as a dozen. This is the first year any have sprayed on my porch. I love cats and will not tolerate my porch being sprayed. The smell is terrible. I bought a bottle not really thinking it would do much good. Boy was I wrong. No more spraying at my front door! It smells so fresh. Works great. Yes the cats went to the windows so I sprayed there. It stopped. One spray won’t do it. You’ll have to do it a few times. But it does help! About once a month I spray my entire along the house. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Spence

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this one. Buy the other Nature's Miracle Just for Cats.
customer_reviews.text: I've used the other Nature's Miracle Just for Cats and accidentally bought this one instead. The other NM Just for Cats has been fantastic and works every time but this one DOES NOT WORK. It's actually made things worse and BOTH cats now urinate ONLY where I've sprayed this. Maybe because both of my cats are just peeing and not spraying? IDK but if your cats don't spray, spend your money on the other NM for cats. That one really truly works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Really does work
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great!! I am absolutely amazed at how well this works. Has a good smell and the cat has not remarked anywhere I have sprayed. He did move a couple times to new areas and I cleaned the area and then sprayed this over and around the new spot and so far he's not gone a second time in any area that has been treated.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: No Help with marking
customer_reviews.text: My late kitty had an accident on the carpet right before he died. It was thoroughly cleaned. A few months ago I adopted a 6mo old kitten. She must have smelled his scent and peed in the same spot. I wasn't happy. I cleaned it thoroughly again with really good solutions to rid any germs or smells. She still wanted to mark there. I bought this because I was desperate for anything to help. I sprayed the carpet heavily and she promptly went to spot and peed again. It hadn't had time to dry. Maybe it's my kitty but I think the solution doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: PBAT26

customer_reviews.title: Nope! Whole bottle gone and kitty empties bladder yet again.
customer_reviews.text: Am I doing this right? Spray, let sit 5 minutes, soak with paper towel, kitty sprays no more. Barely 3 days pass and the rank smell comes back. I took the remaining bottle contents to the carpet again and surprise! Two full bladders of pee exactly where I sprayed this stuff. I know not all cats are the same but I used a whole bottle, nearly one full TP roll, and 40 minutes in the same area. This doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: This worked for me.
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed this once on a chair that my new cat had relieved himself on several times. He did not relieve himself on the chair again. NOTE: I also put some lavender pouch or something that cats don't like in the chair behind the cushion. So I'm not 100% if it was one or the other or a combo of both but I did not expect either to work so I was very impressed. I think it's well worth a try because having cat piss on your furniture is an absolute crusher when you're trying to host a polite evening with the local elite. That bunch just loves wearing white. It's ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Durden

customer_reviews.title: Good for some uses
customer_reviews.text: This worked wonders on my carpet in terms of getting stains out between shampoo treatments, but it did not help lessen markings if that is what your buying this for. I have 2 cats and they mainly mark on my carpet to mark their territories. The issue ran deeper than I expected, and with the help of my vet I was able to get the marking under control but this product did not deter them. I highly recommend as a stain remover though. It neutralizes and deodorizers very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jacinda

customer_reviews.title: Works well for stains and scents
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for taking out the smell of cat urine but I don't really know whether it stops them from doing it again. My cats do this very randomly so unless I sprayed this in a spot they constantly urinated in, I wouldn't know. That being said it takes out the smell and most of the stain from urine- huge lifesaver on furniture. Just make sure it doesn't ruin yours by doing a small swatch first- though if the cat peed on it it's already close to ruined so you might as well. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McCormick

customer_reviews.title: It Saved My New Rug from my Cat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful spray! My cat has peed on every new rug I have purchased over the years. This time, I sprayed the rug right after I took it out of its package. I left for work two days in a row leaving her home by herself and she has NOT PEED ON IT. What a lifesaver! I'm also extremely sensitive to scents but this one is pleasant and does NOT smell like chemicals or harsh perfumes. A+++ spray!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Love this product..........had a stray tom cat spraying my back porch.....the spray works immediately to rid the porch of the tom cat pee smell.....of course, have to spray everytime he comes over but thank goodness can get rid of the smell....like now! highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Lady

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have had an annoying tomcat hanging around my house for months. Yowling and spraying. I have an indoor/outdoor cat that ignores him. This spray works. I sprayed my front porch area and the security door, around the hedge in the drive where I see him spray. Now, checking my overnight camera, I watched the cat sniff the hedge and walk away! Also, my cat doesn't wrinkle his nose at the areas on the porch where the tomcat had sprayed. I'm very happy with this product. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: LoveToRead

customer_reviews.title: It really worked!
customer_reviews.text: Was having trouble with a new kitty, she had been "feral" - a lady brings in stray cats, gets shots and fixed and lets them back outside. My vet let me know there was one for adoption, but warned she may be a little wild. She's taken to "home life" so quickly... HOWEVER, my boy kitty likes to cuddle and she is VERY jealous so was spraying on the places he likes to snuggle next to me...pillow, sofa. I got this and the Feliway...I think they are FINALLY in love...well, he tolerates her, but the spraying has stopped!!
customer_reviews.author: MSS Houston

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT Work!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Nature’s Miracle for both dog and cat messes for years. It used to always work! I thought they used enzymes to do the job. However, I have never used this particular product before and I think it may be new. It has no enzymes in it! I don’t know if they changed their formula or if it is just this product. I am VERY disappointed! This product promises to completely eliminate both oder & stain and keep your cat from returning to the same spot! IT DID NONE OF THESE!
customer_reviews.author: nope

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: The other reviewers are right. I sprayed a clean bathroom rug liberally with this stuff and within the hour, one of our pretty little kitties had marked it as her own. I'm tossing the rug into the wash, this spray into the trash and going back to a rug-less bathroom floor.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: My cat was having an issue with urinating on the sofa. Once I cleaned and deodorized it, I really didn't want her to do it again, so I purchased this product. I've been spraying it occasionally for months and she's never done it again. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: melissadiane75

customer_reviews.title: Great for the “marking”
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad. His basement is like his office and the liter box is down there too. However, some of his cats like to “mark” his books and important papers and sometimes he has to take those same books and papers to work. He teaches on a college campus and the last thing he wants is to be professor stinky. The spray has helped with the issue. My dad feels so guilty whenever he wants to spray it, that he will actually carry the cats upstairs if they happen to be playing down there and then will spray it. I guess everyone should do the same just to be careful.
customer_reviews.author: 🌙Katrina🌙

customer_reviews.title: good solution
customer_reviews.text: it did stop my cat peeing from the first time, but after the odor of the liqued gone, the cat peed again in the same place, I thik I need to use it on the carpet for at least a month. the volume of the bottel is pretty enough. I am satisfaied with the item and its smell, it is like a herb tea that I used to take.
customer_reviews.author: Lamees

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I have two male cats and one has recently started to urine mark. I have used this and a couple of other products. This one seems to work the best. I will say it helps to deter him from the same spots, but I do have to spray it in those spots every couple of days. This may not completely deter him from those spots, but it has worked better than any other products I have tried and for the price I can afford to keep buying it. I say give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: The product states it will protect from cat spraying or peeing again in the same area. DID NOT WORK. With the spray in place, the cat continually went back to the same spot. Will never buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Agnew

customer_reviews.title: Only stuff I've found that stops a repeat spray
customer_reviews.text: I have tried MANY products that successfully eliminate the odor AND stop a repeat. This stuff is now my go to. Since I have a spot my cat likes to hit, I decided to treat that area first. It has been a week and a half and he has NOT sprayed there ONCE! He does check it out but it seems theres something that tells him not to do it. I'm done searching for something that actually works, this stuff ROCKS!!
customer_reviews.author: ak

customer_reviews.title: Cleans and Removes Smell
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product as it does a fantastic job of eliminating pet smells and stains. I have 3 ferrets and a cat and it works great to clean up ferret messes and when my cat decides to get territorial and spray. So far after using this cleaner he hasn't sprayed the same area. Knock on wood. If you are in need a a great pet mess cleaner I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bogert

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: This product is probably the best one out there after Get Serious! for Cats, stopped making their product. Do to chemical sensitivities of one family member, this is the only one we could use as it is fragrance-free. We have tied others but the heavy perfumes they use are unacceptable to us. If you cant handle the perfumes, this is your best bet.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I feel like you need to put a good amount of it down. Unlucky for me it worked too well. My cat stopped peeing on the floor and moved onto peeing on my bed. Good news is this scent is gentle enough to now be on my bed and not bother me. Where will my cat pee next and why not in one of his 2 daily cleaned boxes!! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Angela L.

customer_reviews.title: Not a guarantee fix
customer_reviews.text: Was desperate and decided to try this because of the good reviews. It not work for me. My cat won’t stop using this one spot on our carpet and this made no difference. I shampooed the carpet, blocked off to let dry, sprayed with this, then blocked off again until completely dry and it didn’t change anything. I tried this process 3 times before giving up on this product. Also, it hardly smells any better than cat urine I’m trying to put a stop to.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Chatagnier

customer_reviews.title: I need a refund!! Product was spilled.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this before and it came perfectly fine.. its very useful so my cats don’t spray around the house.. but this time the item was very defective it was half way empty. It had spilled all over the box it came in. I would like either a refund or another free order. The pictures are there of how spilled it was. Please help me.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Asitimbay

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I used this in abundance when one of my cats started marking as she was experiencing significant stress. It curbed her need to mark and now I use it every week or so in high possibility areas and have not had a problem since. This is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work! Our cat kept peeing in the same spot even after using this for three days. They claim if you don’t like it you can return it but several others are having issues with their claims. Seems like this attractant just makes it worse since he wants to spray in this area only. He also sprays wherever else I spray this. Checking other options.
customer_reviews.author: marlena fryman

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed the area heavily where my cat pooped. Next day - left another mess in the same spot. Same results in different incidents in other places in my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: R. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: I love the scent !
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent, but it does not work like I thought it would. The cats are returning to my yard and have continued spraying. I was spraying everyday, but now the bottle has 1/4 left and the sprayer stopped working. EEEWWW to the cats spraying in my yard. Maybe I need to try another product. I rated the easy to use and value $ a 3 because I will need to buy another sprayer to finish out the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: D D

customer_reviews.title: I like the smell of this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell of this stuff, it does clean up a cat spray well. I don't think that it prevents the cat from spaying again though. We do have tile floors so that might add into why it didn't work as a preventative. We've also used it for our daughter and her bed wetting, works well there too.
customer_reviews.author: Sabetha Danes

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This works very well in handling the cat pee smell for me, but it doesn’t work to stop the cat from marking. I enjoy the smell of this product - it’s not chemically, but seems more natural.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: The stuff of miracles
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe this works. My little bombay cat has been peeing all around the house due to stress from a new addition (puppy). I was having to whip the steam cleaner out constantly! I ended up trying this stuff and not only is there essentially no odor from the spray, but I am now noticing my cat peeing less around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Brown

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL GARBAGE.  DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is TOTAL garbage! My cat sprayed EVERYWHERE I sprayed it! Then he kept spraying! I guess he was trying to get rid of the stink of the GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Jones

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Didn't stop my car from spraying. I washed the hell out of the area with my carpet cleaner repeatedly plus used almost the entire bottle of this on that spot and dried it with my hair dryer & she sprayed there less than a week later. Total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: M. Fazzio

customer_reviews.title: It actually works! Works for smell and also stops them from peeing on carpet!
customer_reviews.text: I had tried everything to get my cats to stop peeing on the carpet in one of the rooms of my house. I got this without high hopes, but I have to say it has worked great! I sprayed it on the spots, let it sit 5 minutes, and then blotted it up with paper towels. It pulled the smell out, and the cats have not been peeing on the carpet anymore! I have sprayed it a couple times and left it without blotting it up, and it seems to work that way also. It does not smell good while it is drying, however the smell is not strong by any means. I barely noticed it. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dayon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results!
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple cats and I'm one of these people who has tried everything. The corner of my stair landing keeps getting hit. When I got this product, I cleaned the area thoroughly and sprayed it with this. It has been over a week and still none of the cats have done anything in that area.
customer_reviews.author: Dori B

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: We have a male cat that isn’t neutered and he loves to pee on everything. I spray this on all the furniture before we go to bed at night and so far he hasn’t peed on anything when I do that. If I miss a night he pees on the furniture. Also I saw this same spray at a pet store and they were selling it for more then double the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for anyone that has pets
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough good things about natures miracle. Having three cats we sometimes have mishaps and you’d never know it because of natures miracle. Anyone with pets should have this in their cabinet. Amazons price can’t be beat
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Nass

customer_reviews.title: Don't BUY it they will not return it. It doesn't work. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to return this product and it doesn't work at all, nor did it take away any smell. It just did not work effectively. If there were less stars to give I would give them. Return policy should be listed on this product. 30 dollars and now I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Constanza Nordenflycht

customer_reviews.title: Great for carpets, that's about it.
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this stuff (Cinnamon, so if you're allergic to cinnamon, don't buy). Yes it worked in getting the urine smell out of the carpet from when we first got him (took two treatments), but it doesn't work well at all for couches. Couch cushions are just too big for anything to draw out the urine smell and this spray didn't prevent him from spraying again on the couch. We actually got rid of the couch. But this did work for our carpet and kept him from spraying again there.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Y'all are the best!
customer_reviews.text: TOTALLY WORKS - my cats quit doing their naughty things to my wall once I got this little nifty bottle. :) And, my house smells fresh and clean again. Thank you, Nature's Miracle! Y'all are the best!
customer_reviews.author: msaonika

customer_reviews.title: No more peeing on armchairs!
customer_reviews.text: Our female Bengal doesn't like the new arm chairs we bought and started peeing on them, the seat and the arms! I was horrified as she has never done that! Started spraying the chairs with this and it really works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent cleaner, not much of a deterrent
customer_reviews.text: My kittens had a problem of pooping and peeing all over the house for a few months so I used this stuff to clean up their messes. Thank GOD they grew out of that and now they almost exclusively poop and pee outside!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse A. Safir

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: It totally takes out the smell of cat Pee. Hasn't stopped my cat from repeeing in the same spot , it will take her a couple of days I think the scent where's off. So at first she will Pee in a new area. I've done everything the vet said and she still does it. The cleaner is expensive. I paid the $6.99 for shipping then a while later I seen it at the pet store .ugh
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine  Ickes callahan

customer_reviews.title: Smell's Great
customer_reviews.text: I got this to neutralize the smell of cat urine as my cat decided to pee right next to my front door. It definitely neutralized the smell, but it hasn't done much to deter my cat from peeing in the same spot. It also hard to spray it when the bottle is directed at the ground, because it's in a regular spray bottle that needs to be used upright.
customer_reviews.author: Shamrae Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. I've used this on multiple things multiple times and it does not keep my cat away from it. It doesnt even effect him in anyway. Im sorry to say im very disapointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: BUY A BLACK LIGHT TO FIND THE URINE SPOTS(YACK)
customer_reviews.text: Not sure yet about this product? I will find out in a few days when I look again in the spots I saw the cat urine. BUY A BLACK LIGHT you will be horrified when you find ALL the cat urine spots on your floors and walls. Check it out. I bought a black light from amazon and used it and called the carpet cleaners in horror of what I saw with the black light
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Nature's Miracle Trigger Sprayer Just For Cats,...
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. My cats look upon an area of already destroyed furniture with distaste now.
customer_reviews.author: Tina the S.Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what Nature's Miracle is using in their products but the two that i purchased a year or two ago made be very sick. I'm open to a product like this but without harmful chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: BargainShopper

customer_reviews.title: I love products that actually do what they say it will ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping that it would work and it did. I love products that actually do what they say it will do. Buy the gallon size as it will be cheaper and will save you extra money in the long run. It last long time. Of course you will need a spray bottle!
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: Fast Acting
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly well. I have two neutered male cats (brothers) that keep spraying in certain rooms. Originally, I purchased a different product that was labeled “Professional Strength” but didn’t like the smell. Switched to Natures Miracle which has a natural cat repellent, stopped the spraying and has a nice scent.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha H

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for our cats, but they're crazy...
customer_reviews.text: Well, we'd give it more stars if this actually stopped our neurotic cat spraying and peeing, but probably asking too much if your cats are just crazy. Anyway, get a small sample, it's worth a try, and if it doesn't work then move onto the next thing. At least it is all natural and the scent is relatively nice so good to use for cleanup and some odor masking...
customer_reviews.author: EricY

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product removes stains and odors but doesn’t prevent cat from peeing in same spot on my couch. Took her to vet and nothing is wrong with her. This product simply doesn’t work to prevent urinating and spraying. Disappointed because I bought 4 bottles and already used up two.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: ACTUALLY AMAZING. I had tried everything on this chair my cat likes to pee on from products to steam cleaning to vinegar and baking soda concoctions. This actually worked!!! So happy I do not have to throw out my beloved chair.
customer_reviews.author: Montana d.

customer_reviews.title: OK cleaner, but no effect as a deterrent to re-marking
customer_reviews.text: It seems to do a decent job of cleaning, but does absolutely nothing as a deterrent for our problem cat. I wish I had just stuck with the Nature's Miracle Just for Cats urine remover, which seems to do a more thorough job of cleaning (though it also doesn't act as a deterrent to re-marking). I'm going to try concentrated orange oil next as a deterrent.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: There's only been one incident since I began using this product. Previously, it was a daily struggle with one of our cats spraying. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy C

customer_reviews.title: My cat sniffed it and sat down in the spray
customer_reviews.text: The smell is fine. It reminds me of the red hot cinnamon candies. The spray did nothing to deter my cats from hanging out in the bathroom. They smelled the fresh, wet spray and sat down exactly where I sprayed.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 boys

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Simply put!! This product WORKS As a kitty home.. we need this and buy it often..
customer_reviews.author: AnneM

customer_reviews.title: It Works.
customer_reviews.text: We have a male cat who thinks he needs to mark and then the dogs come behind him and they mark. It seems to deter the cat but the dogs keep on marking, I guess I should have picked something different for the dog marking as I didn't notice this was for cats only.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I guess it works. My kitty liked to pee in a specific part of our gym area and it was really hard to clean it each time because of all the puzzle pieces mats we have set up but it seems to have kept her away from there. Also, keep your literbox clean because the little princess only did it when it wasn't clean enough for her princess needs.
customer_reviews.author: Danaya Khartchenko

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stop stubborn cats
customer_reviews.text: Didn't stop one stubborn cat I have from peeing on my couch. The scent dissipates quickly and you're left with just enough pee smell to ruin the room. Also has the downside that I now synonymize the smell of this product with the smell of cat pee.
customer_reviews.author: Sire Esquire

customer_reviews.title: Deterrent
customer_reviews.text: Keeps that filthy animal off my couch. Should have used it before he sprayed it. Can't get the smell out but it keeps the creature from reapplying it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: This item is worthless.
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing, realized it's basically water with a little essential oils in them. This product is homeopathic garbage. Don't waste energy, money, or hope that you'll have a solution to the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan F

customer_reviews.title: Very good for cleaning up and odor reduction after cat pee in the wrong places
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well to clean up and reduce odor after my old cat started peeing on the carpet at various places around the house. Did not deter him from returning to the scene of the crime and re-offending That said, he was 17 years old, fixed, and was not doing territorial marking, just old and confused. He soon died of renal faliure. Thanks to this product the urine smell did not linger on after his passing.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Does not work, save ur time and money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. Used the entire gallon over 3 days on a new and expensive runner rug, praying the cat urine smell would be removed. Doesnt work and cant return. Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.author: traster

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a little male kitty who is not very happy about my grandbabies coming over so he peed on thier stuff and this spray got rid of the smell and i say buy this before anything eles.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Green

customer_reviews.title: We are very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this product! It doesn’t stain where you spray it and it does work in our case! You have to refresh the areas periodically by retreating. Our cat had behavior issues due to stress. This product doesn’t solve the problem 100 % but it does make a big difference! When we added Feliway defusers it has ended the problem completely! Do take your cat to the vet to be sure it’s not medical! No more spraying the walls by our neutered boy!
customer_reviews.author: David A Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Wha...wha...wha... It works??!
customer_reviews.text: My newly adopted cat decided to mark his territory in unacceptable places. This spray has "marked" the off zones and it actually smells good (to humans anyway). He sniffs and goes back to the litter box as his preferred location. Can't comment on the deterrence to scratching since that wasn't my issue. Oh, you MUST shake the container before use. Didn't really work too well until I read the instructions about that (doh!).
customer_reviews.author: GWickman

customer_reviews.title: Cat pee no more!
customer_reviews.text: I have one cat that is very nervous since she had surgery, and has certain places she likes to pee. I find this product works about 2 weeks, and then needs refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Birdlady10000

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: If ever in doubt what to get...THIS IS IT- IT WORKS! I have tried alot of store items and this is the best. NATURES MIRACLE is the one that did the job with out furniture, floor, woodwork harm. IT WORKS!! Leave on spray areabfor 5 minutes tho...read instructions.
customer_reviews.author: sfreeman

customer_reviews.title: This spray has saved my house. My cat was ...
customer_reviews.text: This spray has saved my house. My cat was being taunted by another animal outside, so after almost 12 years of not peeing in the house "for no reason", my cat decided to per by the front door. A few times. After using this product, he has not peed there anymore. We also just got a puppyand this helps clean up puppy accidents too!
customer_reviews.author: Sara W

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't helped
customer_reviews.text: I have used this over and over and my cat is still being bad. Has not deterred the cat at all. I purchased it because the one for dogs works great. I sprayed on my furniture and the dog stopped lifting his leg. I was really hopeful that the cat one would help with my cat but no dice.
customer_reviews.author: D. D. Garza

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money for me
customer_reviews.text: As with their other product "Pet Repellent", this was just as useless for me and a waste of money. Less than an hour after treatment with other Natures Miracle products, my cat used the same areas.
customer_reviews.author: JonB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It smells great, it makes the house smell like cinnamon cloves and was successful at keeping my male cat from marking on anything.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable on Amazon!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this spray!!!!! its soooo expensive at the stores Amazon is the only place I buy it from, oops!! time to order some more!!
customer_reviews.author: Maila Serda

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great my cat doesn’t have the desire to mark anymore in the area. Does have a strong scent of cloves though
customer_reviews.author: Marcella Banach

customer_reviews.title: Help to cancel it please
customer_reviews.text: Please cancel this recurring order for me! It was a mistake made by my husband. We do not need to have a bottle per month. I already cancelled it one time. but it is coming again. Thank you! Minnie
customer_reviews.author: ShaoWei L.

customer_reviews.title: OK SCENT. NOT HELPING URINE/SPRAYING ISSUE.
customer_reviews.text: The scent is ok but is not helping the urine/spraying problem we have with our cats. Follow the directions but doesn't work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Cadence

customer_reviews.title: No more cat pee and stink!
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor's cats come to my yard and poop & pee on everything (bushes, flowers, even the gravel) and this stuff is actually working to discourage them from doing that. I can already tell a significant difference (thank goodness!). The stench has been awful and this product has fixed that problem as well. So far, I am very, very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Irene's mom

customer_reviews.title: My female, Lady Bentanta, still exhibits signs of ...
customer_reviews.text: My female, Lady Bentanta, still exhibits signs of "heat" from time to time even though she has been spayed twice. ( Second time to remove ovarian remnants). If I use Nature's Miracle wherever she urine marks, she will not go back to that spot. But the sneaky little thing keeps finding new spots, and I keep spraying this stuff. It does not stain or harm fabric or furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Nature's Miracle No More Spraying
customer_reviews.text: This spray does work but must be reapplied after a few days which is the way all of them work.
customer_reviews.author: DIYer Dave

customer_reviews.title: For pet stains and ordors
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats pees outside of the litter boxes, so I spray the spots with this. It dissolves the stains, and gets rid of the smell quickly
customer_reviews.author: llyybbss

customer_reviews.title: It's a Miracle
customer_reviews.text: This is a miracle!! I have several spots in the house where my cats where spraying which was making me so upset because I didn't know which cat was doing it because I have 7 cats, I bought this stuff because I was despite and it works!!! All I did was spray the Nature's Miracle where the cats usually mess and the cats stopped messing there, I also sprayed in areas that I thought they might mess later on.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Weltzbarker

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked. This stuff actually seemed to work. The neighboring cat would hose the front door on a regular basis. We cleaned the door, then applied this product around the porch, on the entry carpet and on the door. The spraying stopped immediately. Impressive, especially to a skeptic like myself.
customer_reviews.author: S. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Didn't really work
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this did not work for us. Well, it worked a time or two, but then my girls went back to doing their business wherever they felt like.
customer_reviews.author: Angieleigh

customer_reviews.title: Part of a solution  to cat soiling outside the box
customer_reviews.text: Works OK, but didn't solve the problem of the cat using a corner my wood floor in the living room. I went on line to find out how to stop the cat from using my living room instead of her litter box. The on-line solution was the answer to my problem. Not sure how much this product helped. Putting a piece of furniture over the spot and washing the floor with ammonia did the trick. Also, using only very hot water to wash the litter box - no smelly chemicals - brought my little lady back to her box.
customer_reviews.author: Elenapoe

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: Our five year old cat recently started spraying the inside of the front door in a territorial response to outdoor cats visiting our porch. Used this spray to clean up every puddle, but it made no difference. Spraying continues on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! My older cat started peeing in the corners around our living room a while back because we made some home improvements/changes that she did not like. We ended up getting rid of our living room curtains after a while because she kept peeing on them. Now that we've started using this she stays away from that area and I've been brave enough to put our Christmas tree up in the corner where she used to pee. So far the presents under the tree have remained pee-free :)
customer_reviews.author: Cristal Logothetis

customer_reviews.title: It actually worked !
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing that helped my cat stop "marking his territory" on our door!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Meh, Ok
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice, but the cats dont seem to be bothered by the smell (yet the product states they should be). Havent noticed any more markings yet, but the cats still vomit in the same places I've sprayed the product.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I’m always skeptical of this type of product because everything else I’ve tried doesn’t do what it says it will but this one really works! Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Leo98

customer_reviews.title: Nature's Miracle No more spraying just for cats worked very well.
customer_reviews.text: We had whole families of cats in our front yard, patio and behind the garage. I used this product, they went away and didn't return.
customer_reviews.author: Ann S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. This helped stop my car from peeing on the floor and encouraged him to use his litter box!
customer_reviews.author: Paul F.

product_meta.title: Nature's Miracle No More Spraying Just for Cats Stain & Odor Remover
product_meta.description: Size:1 galThe all natural repellent pet stain & odor remover prevents cats from revisiting and spraying the same spot twice! When used to clean an area previously sprayed by a cat, Nature’s Miracle No More Spraying eliminates existing stains & odors leaving behind lemon grass and cinnamon scents. These scents repel and prevent cats from returning to the area. Ideal to use when trying to break cats’ spraying habits, No More Spraying will repel cats while eliminating tough deep-set urine stains & odors.
feature_bullets: Quality and performance driven products for your pet
Provide a better quality of living for your pet with United Pet Group

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061.
